tooltips.secret: When you create your API Secret Key, it will only be displayed once for security reasons. You can always reset your API Key by deleting them and creating a new if you loose them

key-dialog.delete-text: Are you sure you want to permanently delete API
key-dialog.create-text: When you create your API Secret Key, it will only be displayed once for security reasons. You can always reset your API Key by deleting them and creating a new if you loose them.
